title: KMC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Medical Officer Posts
description: Kolkata Municipal Corporation (KMC) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Medical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the KMC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking for more, her...
